author: Pavle M
title: Great staff, great location, super modern room
text:
The initial thought when we entered our room was "It's so small". And it was. But the decor was super funky and modern, bed was super comfy and for the two of us it was enough space. The en-suite bathroom was super tiny and I can imagine a taller, bigger person would struggle to use it. I am 6ft1 and I could just about use the toilet and shower. Breakfast was good - not amazing with huge choice, but good enough and we enjoyed it. Location is pretty good and it's a short walk from the Metro station. Most importantly, hotel was clean and well maintained and service was good. Would recommend.
Room Tip: Try and avoid a room close to the stairs - we could hear people walking up and down the stairs a lot... See more room tips
